name: Mastodon White (DISCONTINUED)
description:
DISCONTINUED 30.09.2018
Just a bright theme i made for mastodon for my own use. Made by https://glitch.social/@soft_chomps. Tested on glitch.social which is running master so it might be a little ahead of the curve with regards to interface changes! Works with any instance. Use the setting.
additional_info:
2017-09-16: restyled video player, fixed style issues on fixed profile page
2017-10-04: fixed background color
2017-12-10: prevented RTL marker from affecting other tags, fixed video player styling
2017-12-14: fixed post box button (attachment etc) styling
2018-02-04: updated something but i forget what. the left bar background i think
2018-04-22: added styling for new profile info table thing
2018-04-22: fixed styling for new profile info table thing
2018-05-03: styled list dialogs
2018-05-06: fixed styling for profile info table which was changed from an actual table for some reason
2018-06-24: some styling fixes idk man
